50.eng-name: The Book of Seeking Refuge with Allah

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah said:"The Messenger of Allah [SAW] used to say: 'Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min al-arba': min 'ilmin la yanfa'u, wa min qalbin la yakhsha'u, wa min nafsin la tashba'u, wa min du'a'in la yusma'u (O Allah, I seek refuge in You from four: From knowledge that is of no benefit, from a heart that is not humble, from a soul that is not satisfied and from a supplication that is not answered)

chapter.ara-name: باب الاِسْتِعَاذَةِ مِنْ نَفْسٍ لاَ تَشْبَعُ
chapter.eng-name: Seeking Refuge from a Soul that is not Satisfied
